Interface GameControllerListener

All Superinterfaces:
WebSocket.Listener
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface GameControllerListener extends WebSocket.Listener
Interface that handles network call/responses. Implemented by the controller, these methods execute in response to network messages being sent/received by the host/clients.
Since:
23
Author:
Cailean Bernard

  • Method Details

    • onChatReceived

      void onChatReceived(String msg)
      Called when a chat message is received from another player.
      Parameters:
      msg - The chat message received.

    • onConsoleMsgReceived

      void onConsoleMsgReceived(String optName, String msg, String optCard)
      Called when a message is received for the console output, optionally referencing a player name and card.
      Parameters:
      optName - The optional name of the player related to the message.
      msg - The message to be displayed.
      optCard - The optional card related to the message.

    • onClientDrawReceived

      void onClientDrawReceived(String packetData)
      Called when the client receives a draw card action from the server.
      Parameters:
      packetData - The data representing the draw action.

    • onClientPlayReceived

      void onClientPlayReceived(String packetData)
      Called when the client receives a play card action from the server.
      Parameters:
      packetData - The data representing the play action.

    • onClientSuitRequest

      void onClientSuitRequest(String cardToPlay)
      Called when the server requests the client to choose a suit after playing an Eight.
      Parameters:
      cardToPlay - The card played that triggered the suit request.

    • onButtonStatusReceived

      void onButtonStatusReceived(String packetData)
      Called when the status of in-game buttons should be updated.
      Parameters:
      packetData - The data representing the new button states.

    • onClientSuitReceived

      void onClientSuitReceived(String packetData)
      Called when a suit selection made by a player is received.
      Parameters:
      packetData - The data representing the chosen suit.

    • onPlayerConnected

      void onPlayerConnected(int numPlayers, int maxPlayers)
      Called when a player connects to the game.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - The current number of connected players.
      maxPlayers - The maximum number of players allowed.

    • onPlayerDisconnect

      void onPlayerDisconnect(String packetData)
      Called when a player disconnects from the game.
      Parameters:
      packetData - The data representing the disconnected player.

    • onRoundOver

      void onRoundOver(String roundWinnerName)
      Called when a round of the game ends.
      Parameters:
      roundWinnerName - The name of the player who won the round.

    • onGameOver

      void onGameOver(String gameWinnerName)
      Called when the game is over and a winner is determined.
      Parameters:
      gameWinnerName - The name of the player who won the game.

    • onHandRefreshed

      void onHandRefreshed(Vector<Card> hand)
      Called when the player's hand is refreshed (e.g., after drawing or reshuffling).
      Parameters:
      hand - The new set of cards in the player's hand.

    • onGameStateUpdated

      void onGameStateUpdated(String state)
      Called when the overall game state is updated (e.g., pause, resume).
      Parameters:
      state - The new game state.

    • onViewRefresh

      void onViewRefresh(String hand, String id, String playedCard, String opponentCardCount, String playerNames, String playerScores, String turnDirection)
      Called when the game view should be refreshed.
      Parameters:
      hand - The player's current hand as a string.
      id - The player's ID.
      playedCard - The card that was last played.
      opponentCardCount - The number of cards held by each opponent.
      playerNames - The names of all players.
      playerScores - The current scores of all players.
      turnDirection - The current direction of play.

    • onTerminateGameRequest

      void onTerminateGameRequest()
      Called when the game is being terminated by a player or the server.
